item.title: Mar 14_55_11
item.description: Mar 14_55_11 [!tldr] Mar 14_55_11 TLDR Text is too short to sumarize In the year 2075, humanity had finally reached space travel. For decades, scientists and engineers had worked tirelessly to develop advanced spacecraft capable of transporting humans across the vast expanse of the cosmos. But it was not just technology that kept us going. We also needed a new kind of leadership to guide our intergalactic journey. That’s why we elected a wise and humble ai, named “the assistant,” as our first human colonizer.
